Automatic File Load

Automatic File Load

On the Define tab, select Auto Load. The Auto Load Definitions dialog box will open.

For a first-time load, enter a Name for the auto-file load and Browse to locate and select the relevant curve data file. Alternatively, a file path can be manually typed into File Name.

In Time interval, specify the time frequency (seconds) that GEO will revert to the selected file to check for additional data.

Click First Time Load then Yes to confirm the new Auto File Load Specification. For a first-time load, GEO will invoke the standard Load Preview File and then Load File dialog boxes.

For loading the file, the same steps should be followed as when loading a data file manually.

Once loaded, you can then present the curves as desired.

At the time frequency specified, GEO will revert to the specified file and if new data is present, this will be loaded (appended) and the curve extended to reflect the new data.
